title: I'd Like To Be
subtle:
Poetry (nonfiction), 272 words, Level K (Grade 2), Lexile 690            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     E and H		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     E and H		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in level                     E		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     E and H
description: Life has endless possibilities, and you can be anything you want to be! I'd Like to Be is an entertaining poem that introduces students to a variety of professions. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing and the proper use of contractions. The book and lesson are also available for levels E and H.
highFrequencyWords: discover, fantasy, galaxies, possibilities, stew, vet
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Consonant Blends : Identify initial and final consonant st-blend
phonics: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
